translations: 探矿杖；飞弹；短程往返火车

sentences.sentence: This made him look like a doodlebug, so I began calling him "doodle".
sentences.translation: 这使他看上去像一只幼虫，所以我开始叫他“嘟嘟”。

sentences.sentence: This made him look like a doodlebug, so I began calling him 'doodle.
sentences.translation: 这使他看上去像一只幼虫，所以我开始叫他“嘟嘟”。
